message:
I am trying to switch from xterm to gnome-terminal but have no success.
I am not familiar with python but does anybody know how to fix this?

Original exception was:
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/usr/bin/gnome-terminal", line 3, in <module>
import string
File "/usr/lib/python3.6/string.py", line 52, in <module>
import re as _re
File "/usr/lib/python3.6/re.py", line 142, in <module>
class RegexFlag(enum.IntFlag):
author: worufu

posts.message: Use '--' instead of '-e' as the Terminal arg for gnome-terminal
posts.author: cgogoel

posts.message:
Thank you for the suggestion, but still the same error.

These are my settings https://uploads.disquscdn.c...
